item.description: Installing PowerShell Core on Ubuntu Linux If you’re looking to get started with PowerShell on Linux, specifically Ubuntu, this guide has you covered. We’ll walk through installing the necessary dependencies, setting up PowerShell Core, and configuring Visual Studio Code (VSCode) for editing PowerShell scripts. Install Useful Tools Before we install PowerShell Core, let’s make sure we have some helpful tools in place.
